title: Arts Special: Is The Sector Weeks From Oblivion?
itunes:title: Arts Special: Is The Sector Weeks From Oblivion?
description:
In this special episode, we focus on a sector that's been among the worst hit by the pandemic: the arts.

Giles Watling, Conservative MP for Clacton and a former actor, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek Britain's cultural institutions are weeks from oblivion, but spells how out the government can save them.

Plus, Stuart Murphy, CEO of the English National Opera, explains how the company is adapting to survive in difficult times.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
